pages.text:
American Legion Post 57
BEGIN CONTENT
MEMBERSHIP REQUIREMENTS
REQUIREMENTS TO JOIN THE AMERICAN LEGION
IMPORTANT: EVERYONE MUST SUBMIT A COPY OF
DD 214, Drivers License with Veteran Designation, or VA Card with Service Connected Designation.
NEW MEMBERSHIP
Click on above logo WHY YOU SHOULD BELONG
Eligible veterans applying for first time membership must submit the following information to Post Membership Committee:
1. Complete American Legion Membership application by clicking
here
.
2.
Email supporting documentation to
post57membership@gmail.com
. A Membership Officer will contact you.
3.
Membership Dues Payment. Dues are $50 per year.
Make checks payable to our Post listed above.
DO NOT SEND CASH.
ELIGIBILITY
MEMBERSHIP ELIGIBILTY
in the American Legion is based on honorable service with the U. S. Armed Forces:
DECEMBER 7 1942 - PRESENT
Because eligibility dates remain open, all members of the U.S. Armed Forces are eligible to join The American Legion at this time, until the date of the end of hostilities as determined by the government of the United States.
Must have served at least one day of active military duty during one of the dates below and honorably discharged or still serving honorably.
For any questions or post to post transfers, please contact our Membership Chairman, or stop at the Post.
Email:
post57membership@gmail.com
Phone:
(386) 752-7776
For online renewals go to
legion.org
.
END CONTENT

American Legion Post 57
BEGIN CONTENT
Contact Us
2602 SW MAIN Boulevard Lake City Fl 32025
Want information about our Post?
Mail your questions to the above address. We will make every effort to respond to you as soon as possible.
E-
mail us   (
americanlegion57@comcast.net )
T
elephone
Us with your inquiries.
Our Telephone Number is
:
(
386-752-7776
)
Our Post
Web Site is: (
www.americanlegion57.0rg
)
Our Post welcomes your input. Forward your comments, opinions, ideas on how to improve our website. Send us your photos, notices of special events, your fundraisers and other items of interest that enhance the quality of life for the citizens of our community.
Our Post, at it's sole discretion, will publish your contributions we feel are merited. Express yourself.   Become an active member of our community.
END CONTENT
